definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: Polymers of vinyl chloride or of other halogenated olefins, in primary forms.
sentences.chinese: 初級形狀的氯乙烯或其他鹵化烯烴聚合物。

sentences.english: Micronucleus test of Vicia faba root tips cell is used to research the genotoxicity of Trichloroethylene (TCE).
sentences.chinese: 應用蠶豆根尖微核試驗研究了三氯乙烯的遺傳毒性。

sentences.english: The main character in this book is Tom Canty .
sentences.chinese: 主角在這本書是湯姆氯乙烯。

sentences.english: Case-Control Study on Renal Cell Cancer and Occupational Exposure to Trichloroethylene .
sentences.chinese: 病例對照研究腎細胞癌和職業暴露氯乙烯。

sentences.english: It is easier to install a PVC liner in a squarer pond.
sentences.chinese: 聚氯乙烯是易於安裝在一個平方襯墊水池。

sentences.english: Main factors influencing wear-resistance of PVC plastic floor were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了影響聚氯乙烯塑料地板耐磨性的主要因素。

sentences.english: We are looking for soft, durable, embossed PVC leather.
sentences.chinese: 我們在尋找柔軟的，耐用的壓花聚氯乙烯皮革。

sentences.english: Manufacture of vinyl chloride monomer is an example of this.
sentences.chinese: 氯乙烯單聚物的製造就是這樣的一個例子。

sentences.english: Dry cleaning installations that use dry cleaning solvents other than perchloroethylene.
sentences.chinese: 乾洗裝置使用的乾洗溶劑以外的其他氯乙烯。

sentences.english: Homopolymer and copolymer resins of vinyl chloride.
sentences.chinese: 氯乙烯均聚物和共聚物樹脂。

sentences.english: PERC, perchloroethylene, arrived on the scene and was thought to save the day.
sentences.chinese: 氯乙烯，趕到現場，和被認爲是拯救天。

sentences.english: Production and market status of ethylene perchloride at domestic and abroad is introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了四氯乙烯國內外生產現狀和市場狀況。

sentences.english: The polymeric shell is a copolymer of a vinylidene chloride and acrylonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 該聚合體外殼是偏二氯乙烯與丙烯腈的共聚物。

sentences.english: The cold resistance is an important property of soft polyvinyl chloride(PVC).
sentences.chinese: 耐寒性是軟質聚氯乙烯的重要性能指標之一。

sentences.english: The oxygen-generating bag is made of PVC plastic film, and the oxygen-generating powder is sodium carbonate peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 產氧袋由聚氯乙烯薄膜製成，產氧劑爲過碳酸鈉。

sentences.english: Traditional dry cleaning uses a solvent called perchloroethylene, which is toxic enough to be treated as hazardous waste.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的干係方法通常會使用一種叫做全氯乙烯的溶劑。
